original: intros n h g f H. intro bij. inversion bij as [n' g' h' Hg Hh Hgh Hhg]. unfold sum_nat. rewrite sum_bounded_permutation with (g := g') (f := f). rewrite sum_bounded_permutation with (g := h') (f := fun i => f (g' i)). f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intro i. apply H. apply Hg. apply Hhg.
